content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetSiteDeliveryDomains2 path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/delivery/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/sites/{site_id}/delivery_domains content: params
